title: Staff Software Engineer, Systems Infrastructure (Observability)
description:
LinkedIn is the world’s largest professional network, built to help members of all backgrounds and experiences achieve more in their careers. Our vision is to create economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce. Every day our members use our products to make connections, discover opportunities, build skills and gain insights. We believe amazing things happen when we work together in an environment where everyone feels a true sense of belonging, and that what matters most in a candidate is having the skills needed to succeed. It inspires us to invest in our talent and support career growth. Join us to challenge yourself with work that matters.
   

  

 Join us to transform the way the world works.
   

  

 As part of our world\\-class software engineering team, you will be building the next\\-generation observability platforms for LinkedIn, including but not limited to: instrumenting applications and infrastructure to collect meaningful metrics, logs, and traces; Collaborate with development teams to ensure consistent and comprehensive instrumentation across all systems; Develop and maintain libraries, frameworks, and tools to simplify instrumentation. You will work and learn among the best, putting to use your passion for building and scaling observability platforms and your passion for writing code that performs at an extreme scale \\- come join our Observability Engineering team and share the knowledge with a broader community, while making a real impact within LinkedIn.
   

  

 The Observability Experience (OE) group is charted to simplify and drive observability for LinkedIn. The Observability Platforms (sub team of OE) is responsible for billions of operational metrics ingested every minute within LinkedIn. Observability Platforms maintains the platforms and products for metrics ingestion, storage, retrieval, visualization, alerting, incident creation \\& escalation, remediation, health\\-checking and experience platform. We are one of the very few companies globally with a custom\\-built platform to support billions of metrics ingested at millions of QPS.
   

  

 This role will be based in Bangalore, India.
   

  

 At LinkedIn, our approach to flexible work is centered on trust and optimized for culture, connection, clarity, and the evolving needs of our business. The work location of this role is hybrid, meaning it will be performed both from home and from a LinkedIn office on select days, as determined by the business needs of the team.
   

  

 Responsibilities:
   

 \\- You will own the technical strategy for broad or complex requirements with insightful and forward\\-looking approaches that go beyond the direct team and solve large open\\-ended problems.
   

 \\- You will design, implement, and optimize the performance of large\\-scale distributed systems with security and compliance in mind.
   

  

 \\- You will Improve the observability and understandability of various systems with a focus on improving developer productivity and system sustenance
   

 \\- You will effectively communicate with the team, partners and stakeholders.
   

 \\- You will mentor other engineers, define our challenging technical culture, and help to build a fast\\-growing team
   

 \\- You will work closely with the open\\-source community to participate and influence cutting edge open\\-source projects
   

 \\- You will deliver incremental impact by driving innovation while iteratively building and shipping software at scale
   

 \\- You will diagnose technical problems, debug in production environments, and automate routine tasks
   

  

 Basic Qualifications:
   

 \\- BA/BS Degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline, or equivalent practical experience
   

 \\- 8\\+ years of industry experience in software design, development, and algorithm related solutions
   

 \\- 8\\+ years of experience programming in object\\-oriented languages such as Java, C\\+\\+, Python, Go, C and/or other Functional languages
   

 \\- Hands on experience developing large\\-scale observability platforms with an understanding of distributed systems, microservice architecture, pub\\-sub systems, logging /metrics / tracing platforms
   

 \\- 3\\+ years of experience in an architect or an equivalent technical leadership position
   

  

 Preferred Qualifications:
   

 \\- 5\\+ years experience in data collection technologies such as Open Telemetry, cloud APIs, instrumenting infrastructure and application event data
   

 \\- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to effectively articulate complex technical concepts
   

 \\- Ability to navigate complex decision\\-making and effectively communicate across teams
   

 \\- Ability to work independently and collaboratively, leading and mentoring others in observability best practices
   

 \\- Experience in architecting, building, and running large\\-scale systems
   

 \\- Maintainer or contributor of open source projects
   

  

 Suggested Skills:
   

 \\- OpenTelemetry
   

 \\- Backend Systems Infrastructure
   

 \\- OLAP systems
   

  

 You will Benefit from our Culture:
   

 We strongly believe in the well\\-being of our employees and their families. That is why we offer generous health and wellness programs and time away for employees of all levels.
   

  

  

 India Disability Policy
   

 LinkedIn is an equal employment opportunity employer offering opportunities to all job seekers, including individuals with disabilities. For more information on our equal opportunity policy, please visit https://legal.linkedin.com/content/dam/legal/Policy\\_India\\_EqualOppPWD\\_9\\-12\\-2023\\.pdf
   

  

 Global Data Privacy Notice for Job Candidates
   

 This document provides transparency around the way in which LinkedIn handles personal data of employees and job applicants: https://legal.linkedin.com/candidate\\-portal

title: Frontend Developer
description:
About Us
 
 We at SimplSo empower retail brands to excel in both digital and physical realms by providing expert technology solutions that streamline operations and enhance customer experiences. We specialize in creating custom e\\-commerce solutions that are tailored precisely to your brand’s unique ethos and operational needs, ensuring a compelling and influential online presence. Additionally, we extend our expertise to omnichannel integrations, equipping brick\\-and\\-mortar locations with state\\-of\\-the\\-art technology to ensure seamless synchronization with online operations, delivering a consistent and unified customer experience across all touchpoints.
 



  




 Job Description
 
 Join SimplSo, a dynamic and innovative boutique eCommerce agency, as a Frontend Developer. We are seeking a creative and skilled individual to help build responsive, user\\-friendly webpages. If you are passionate about crafting seamless user experiences and excited about using cutting\\-edge technology to transform the digital and physical retail spaces, SimplSo is the place for you.
 



  





  





**Responsibilities** 



* Develop and implement front\\-end web code, working closely with web designers and backend developers to create an optimized, responsive experience.
* Utilize Vue.js or React.js to build dynamic interfaces that are efficient and reusable.
* Manage Shopify\\-based platforms to ensure seamless ecommerce functionality.
* Integrate and manage content through Contentful to provide a cohesive digital experience.
* Collaborate with project managers and other team members to meet deadlines and achieve project goals.
* Stay current with industry trends and apply best practices in web design and development.



  




 Requirements
 * Proven experience in frontend development with a strong portfolio of successful projects.
* Expertise in JavaScript frameworks, particularly Vue.js or React.js.
* Strong experience with Shopify and its APIs for custom solutions.
* Proficiency in using Contentful or similar CMS.
* Ability to translate design wireframes into interactive elements with precise visual and functional execution.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and the ability to perform in a fast\\-paced environment.
* Strong communication and team collaboration skills.



  





**Good to have** 




  




* Experience with additional programming languages or frameworks is a plus.
* Prior experience in an e\\-commerce development environment.
* Familiarity with agile development methodologies.
* A passion for UI/UX design and improving website usability.



  




 Benefits
 * Competitive salary with quarterly incentive\\-based growth opportunities.
* Full\\-time role with a 5\\-day working week.
* No contractual bonds, providing freedom and flexibility.
* Opportunity to work in a fast\\-paced startup environment, enabling rapid professional growth.
* Be part of a vibrant team that values creativity and innovation.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Join our digital revolution in NatWest Digital X
   

  

 In everything we do, we work to one aim. To make digital experiences which are effortless and secure.
   

  

 So we organise ourselves around three principles: engineer, protect, and operate. We engineer simple solutions, we protect our customers, and we operate smarter.
   

  

 Our people work differently depending on their jobs and needs. From hybrid working to flexible hours, we have plenty of options that help our people to thrive.
   

  

 This role is based in India and as such all normal working days must be carried out in India.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Join us as a Software Engineer
   

  

* This is an opportunity for a driven Software Engineer to take on an exciting new career challenge
* Day\\-to\\-day, you'll build a wide network of stakeholders of varying levels of seniority
* It’s a chance to hone your existing technical skills and advance your career
* We're offering this role at associate level


**What You'll Do**
 In your new role, you’ll engineer and maintain innovative, customer centric, high performance, secure and robust solutions.
   

  

 You’ll be working within a feature team and using your extensive experience to engineer software, scripts and tools that are often complex, as well as liaising with other engineers, architects and business analysts across the platform.
   

  

 You’ll also be:
   

  

* Producing complex and critical software rapidly and of high quality which adds value to the business
* Working in permanent teams who are responsible for the full life cycle, from initial development, through enhancement and maintenance to replacement or decommissioning
* Collaborating to optimise our software engineering capability
* Designing, producing, testing and implementing our working code
* Working across the life cycle, from requirements analysis and design, through coding to testing, deployment and operations


**The Skills You'll Need**
 You’ll need a background in software engineering, software design, architecture, and an understanding of how your area of expertise supports our customers.
   

  

 You’ll also need:
   

  

* Experience of working with development \\& testing tools, bug tracking tools and wikis
* Experience in Java, Microservices, Multithreading and Spring Boot
* Experience of DevOps, Testing and Agile methodology and associated toolsets
* A background in solving highly complex, analytical and numerical problems
* Experience of implementing programming best practice, especially around scalability, automation, virtualisation, optimisation, availability and performance

title: No Code Developer
description:

 Wix Studio, Framer or similar tools) required.
 




  





  





 Role Description
 



  





 This is a freelance hybrid/remote role for a No Code Developer located in Chennai, with some work from home acceptable. The No Code Developer will be responsible for developing, and maintaining applications using no\\-code and low\\-code platforms. The developer will collaborate with the team to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions. Day\\-to\\-day tasks also include troubleshooting and optimizing applications for improved performance and user experience.
 



  





 Qualifications

* Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot and debug applications
* Ability to understand and translate business requirements into technical solutions
* Strong communication and collaboration skills
* Ability to work independently and in a team environment
* Knowledge of basic web technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript) is a plus
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is a plus

title: AI/ML Engineer
description:
**Job Title:** 
 AI/ML Engineer
 



**Experience:** 
 3\\-6 Years
 



**Location:** 
 Hybrid (Pune)
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Full\\-Time
 



  





**Roles \\& Responsibilities:** 




**1\\. Model Development \\& Training** 



* Design, train, and fine\\-tune AI/ML models, especially
 **Generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs)** 
 , to address specific use cases.
* Build
 **conversational AI solutions and chatbots** 
 using frameworks such as
 **LangChain, RAG (Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation), and Chain\\-of\\-Thought (CoT) prompting** 
 .
* Apply advanced techniques, including
 **embeddings, fine\\-tuning, and custom prompting strategies** 
 .
* Incorporate
 **REACT (Retrieve, Extract, Adapt, Construct, Think)** 
 methods to enhance model performance.
* Develop
 **scalable AI solutions** 
 for seamless integration into production environments.



**2\\. Data Handling** 



* Manage
 **large\\-scale datasets** 
 for AI/ML applications, ensuring data quality, transformation, and normalization.
* Conduct
 **data preprocessing, munging, and analysis** 
 to extract valuable insights.
* Implement
 **scalable data engineering workflows** 
 for model development and deployment.



**3\\. Cloud AI/ML Deployment** 



* Deploy, manage, and optimize AI models on
 **Google Cloud Platform (GCP)** 
 (or other platforms like AWS/Azure).
* Utilize
 **GCP services** 
 such as
 **Vertex AI, BigQuery, Cloud Functions, and Dataflow** 
 for AI workflows.



**4\\. Collaboration \\& Solutioning** 



* Work with
 **cross\\-functional teams** 
 (product managers, data scientists, and engineers) to deliver AI\\-driven solutions.
* Integrate models into
 **client\\-facing applications** 
 ensuring end\\-to\\-end implementation.
* Support scalable development using
 **Docker for containerization** 
 (preferred).



**5\\. Continuous Improvement** 



* Stay updated with
 **latest advancements** 
 in AI/ML and Generative AI frameworks.
* Proactively learn and apply new
 **tools, libraries, and methodologies** 
 to improve processes.



**6\\. Web Scraping (Optional but Preferred)** 



* Implement
 **web scraping solutions** 
 to gather data from unstructured sources for training and validation.



  





**Required Skills \\& Qualifications:** 



* 3–6 years of experience in
 **AI/ML model development, training, and fine\\-tuning** 
 .
* Strong programming skills in
 **Python and SQL** 
 .
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **Generative AI, LLMs, and NLP techniques** 
 .
* Experience with
 **Lang\\-Chain, RAG frameworks, and advanced prompting strategies** 
 .
* Proficiency in
 **CoT prompting, Model Context Protocol (MCP), and Agent\\-to\\-Agent (A2A) orchestration** 
 .
* Strong knowledge of
 **embeddings and fine\\-tuning models** 
 for specific tasks.
* Solid understanding of
 **ML algorithms and statistical analysis** 
 .
* Experience with
 **large datasets and scalable data workflows** 
 .
* Hands\\-on with
 **GCP (Vertex AI, BigQuery)** 
 or equivalent cloud platforms (
 **AWS/Azure** 
 ).
* Familiarity with
 **Docker** 
 for deployment and containerization.
* Strong skills in
 **data cleaning, transformation, and normalization** 
 .



  





**Preferred Skills** 



* Knowledge of
 **Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback (RLHF)** 
 .
* Familiarity with
 **REACT frameworks** 
 .
* Experience in
 **web scraping techniques** 
 .



  





**Key Attributes** 



* Strong
 **analytical and problem\\-solving** 
 abilities.
* Ability to work
 **independently and collaboratively** 
 .
* Excellent
 **communication skills** 
 for stakeholder interaction.
* Proactive in adopting
 **new AI technologies and frameworks** 
 .

title: AI/ML Specialist
description:
🌟
 **\\#CareersAtOnelab \\| Design the Future. Solve Real Problems. Grow with Us.** 




**👉** 
 www.onelabventures.com
 



**Location:** 
 Hinjewadi Phase 1, Pune (Onsite)

 1–4 Years
 



**Employment Type:** 
 Full\\-Time

 As per company norms
 



  





 ⚡
 **Important Notes:** 




**✔️ Only Immediate Joiners (0–7 Days) will be preferred** 




**✔️ Candidates from Maharashtra preferred** 




**✔️ Preference for 2\\+ years in the same company** 




**✔️ Local Pune candidates will get priority** 




  





**🎯 Job Summary:** 




**We are seeking a skilled AI/ML Specialist \\| Machine Learning Engineer \\| Intelligent Systems Developer** 
 to build, deploy, and optimize intelligent systems.
 



 The role involves working on ML pipelines, Large Language Models (LLMs), and Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures for real\\-world applications.
 



  





 📋
 **Responsibilities:** 



* Build \\& maintain RAG pipelines (LlamaIndex, LangChain, Vector DBs)
* Train \\& deploy ML/DL models (CNN, RNN, Transformers, YOLO, Stable Diffusion)
* Develop backend APIs (FastAPI, Flask, Django)
* Implement CI/CD \\& MLOps (Docker, Kubernetes, MLflow, Jenkins)

* ML/DL expertise (Regression, XGBoost, CNNs, Transformers, etc.)
* NLP tools (Hugging Face, embeddings, preprocessing)

* Official Notice Period

 Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

 .

 for peace of mind.

title: Web Development Intern
description:
**🌐 Internship Opportunity: Web Development Intern**

 Remote

 3–6 months

 Immediate

**About Us:**
 Relief Mission Foundation is a registered charitable organization based in Jaipur, committed to transforming the lives of underprivileged children and vulnerable communities. Our mission is to foster meaningful connections between individuals and communities to mobilize resources for the well\\-being, education, and future of children in need.
   

 We believe that technology and innovation can amplify social impact. Join us as a Web Development Intern and contribute your skills to build and enhance our digital presence.
   

  

**About the Internship:**
 We are looking for a
 **motivated and skilled Web Development Intern** 
 to join our remote team. This role is ideal for individuals who are passionate about coding, web design, and digital problem\\-solving while gaining practical experience in the NGO sector.

**Perks:**

title: Experienced Microsoft 365 Developer (India, Remote)
description:
**Company Description** 




 We suggest you enter details here.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 We’re hiring a
 **Developer** 
 to work with our US based customer, reporting directly to the product management executive in the client organisation. This is a remote, WFH position based in India. The assignment will start with delivering a few high\\-impact internal tools. You’ll build a simple front door in SharePoint/Teams and ship two already defined automation products. You’ll then help expand to more automations and more sophisticated applications.
 



  





 You’ll work daily with the client’s product lead and demo progress each week.
 



  





**Pay** 




 INR 10 Lakhs to INR 14 Lakhs CTC per annum.
 



  





**What you’ll do** 



* Build SharePoint/Teams pages, lists, and flows users actually use.
* Parse statements, apply simple rules, send alerts, and publish weekly digests.
* Connect to review sources via APIs and summarize trends by property.
* Wire data to clear dashboards; ship small improvements every two weeks.
* Document simply; keep a short “known issues” list and close it fast.



**Must\\-have experience** 



* SharePoint Online and Teams (building useful pages and notifications).
* Power Automate flows with error handling and monitoring.
* JavaScript/TypeScript
 **or** 
 Python for light back\\-end logic.
* API integrations and secure handling of credentials.
* Clear writing, checklists, and demo\\-driven delivery.



**Nice to have** 



* Power BI basics; Power Apps (canvas); Graph API/SPFx.
* Light prompt design for small, safe summaries inside Microsoft tools.



**Schedule** 



* Daily
 **3\\-hour work time overlap with California** 
 . The rest of your hours in India daytime/evening. (During US standard time, India windows shift one hour later.)



**Location \\& type** 



* Remote, India. Contract with the option to extend.



**How to apply** 




 Send your CV and
 **two short notes** 
 :
 


1. a SharePoint/Teams build you’re proud of (what problem, what you built, link or screenshots), and
2. an API integration you coded (what API, what you did).



 Send applications to jawad.elahi@flexgcc.com

title: Shopify Developer
description:
About Us
 
 We at SimplSo empower retail brands to excel in both digital and physical realms by providing expert technology solutions that streamline operations and enhance customer experiences. We specialize in creating custom e\\-commerce solutions that are tailored precisely to your brand’s unique ethos and operational needs, ensuring a compelling and influential online presence. Additionally, we extend our expertise to omnichannel integrations, equipping brick\\-and\\-mortar locations with state\\-of\\-the\\-art technology to ensure seamless synchronization with online operations, delivering a consistent and unified customer experience across all touchpoints.
 



  




 Job Description
 
 This is a full\\-time on\\-site role for a Shopify Developer. The Shopify Developer will be responsible for developing, customizing, and maintaining Shopify websites. The developer will work closely with the design team and clients to understand technical requirements and create solutions that meet the project goals.
 



  




 Requirements
 * Experience in Shopify development, including app development, migration, and optimization

 Benefits

* Opportunity to work in a fast\\-paced startup environment, enabling rapid professional growth.
* Be part of a vibrant team that values creativity and innovation.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Job Title:** 
 Frontend Architect
 



  





**Job Type:** 
 Full\\-time, Contractual

**Job Summary** 




 Join our customer's team as a Frontend Architect and play a pivotal role in shaping next\\-generation web applications. You’ll leverage modern frameworks and cloud technologies to deliver scalable, secure, and high\\-performance solutions. Bring your technical expertise and communication skills to a collaborative environment that values innovation and continuous improvement.

* Design, architect, and maintain scalable frontend systems using React.js, ensuring robust integration with backend services built on FastAPI or Node.js.
* Write clean, modular, and well\\-documented code in React
* Deploy, monitor, and manage applications in AWS, utilizing services like ECS, ECR, EKS, S3, and CodePipeline for cloud\\-native operations.
* Implement rigorous testing strategies, including unit, integration, and end\\-to\\-end tests through frameworks such as Swagger and Pytest.

* Collaborate closely with product, design, and backend teams, ensuring smooth communication and alignment throughout the development lifecycle.

description:
**Job Description – Senior DevOps Engineer** 




**Location:**

 11:00 AM – 8:30 PM IST
 



**Experience:** 
 6–8 years

 Full\\-Time
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We are looking for a highly skilled
 **Senior DevOps Engineer** 
 with 6–8 years of experience in cloud infrastructure, automation, and CI/CD practices. The role requires strong expertise in AWS, Terraform, container platforms, and large\\-scale system operations. You will collaborate closely with developers and QA teams to deliver secure, scalable, and reliable infrastructure.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Develop automation tooling and scripts using
 **C\\# or Python** 
 for performance tuning and troubleshooting.
* Design and manage AWS multi\\-account environments with cross\\-account IAM roles, VPC networking, and S3 gateway endpoints.
* Implement secure cloud patterns using
 **KMS encryption** 
 and least\\-privilege access.
* Manage Infrastructure as Code using
 **Terraform** 
 —reusable modules, workspaces, and pipelines with proper approvals.
* Deploy and manage
 **.NET workloads on ECS** 
 , including task definitions, autoscaling, and ECR image management.
* Configure and optimize
 **S3 buckets**

* Build and maintain
 **CI/CD pipelines** 
 using GitHub Actions or Azure DevOps for infrastructure and applications.
* Set up
 **monitoring and observability** 
 with CloudWatch, SNS/SQS, and integrate with QE for system reliability.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, provide documentation, and ensure smooth operational handovers.



  





**Must\\-Have Skills \\& Qualifications** 



* 6–8 years of hands\\-on DevOps experience.
* Strong coding ability in
 **C\\# or Python** 
 .
* Deep expertise in
 **AWS (IAM, VPC, S3, ECS, KMS, multi\\-account setup)** 
 .
* Proven skills in
 **Terraform** 
 (Cloud/Enterprise, private module registries).

 **ECS \\& ECR container platforms** 
 .
